__e: For one hour you haven't opened your mouth except for sausages, then you ate half my steak.
I got your bread, and your sausages, and a bit of cheese there.
There was this 2-for-1 sausage dealio and I wanted to know if you wanted one but you didn't pick up so I ate both of them and life was good.
There'll be pretty girls, sausages, beer.
I came over here to sleep, not to have your fat little sausage fingers all over me.
It must have been something I ate... - those Vienna sausages.
